Not reproducible and user can continue to work - not critical for M8.

I could change the code and test for null but in fact there's no way that the
field can be null at that point (checked together with Martin).

I suspect a VM bug.

Happens when editor start to reconcile a Java element which is null.
Fix is to test for null but we should check why we get null.

Happens when
1. reusing editors
2. opening a file from repository (has no model)
3. switch to another editor

Fixed in my workspace.
